algorithms.disjointSets

Class DisjointForest.RootedTreeDisjointSet<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.disjointSets.DisjointForest.RootedTreeDisjointSet<T>
  • Enclosing class:
    DisjointForest<T>

    public static class DisjointForest.RootedTreeDisjointSet<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    each disjoint set (== instance of this class), has a representative which is a member of the nodes of this set
    Author:
    nichole

    • Method Detail

      • getNodes

        public java.util.Set<DisjointSet2Node<T>> getNodes()
        find the least common ancestor for node x and y in a tree using Tarjan's off-line least common ancestor algorithm. implemented from pseudocode in Cormen et al. Introduction to Algorithms.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        public DisjointSet2Node lca(DisjointSet2Node x, DisjointSet2Node y) { method lca(u) : makeset(u) ancestor[ findSet(u)] = u for each child v of u in tree : do lca(v) union(u, v) ancestor[ findSet(u) ] = u color[u] = black for each node v such that u,v is a member of the unordered pairs of nodes if (color[v] == black) then return ancestor[ findSet(v) ] }

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
